alert.note: Alert for Carter; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 2:11PM MST until November 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow showers and blowing snow will gradually decrease into the evening. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Carter and Fallon. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from Midnight tonight to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick roads and areas of poor visibility to continue through the afternoon. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
